Fall_River.Hathaway Brightman House:
The Hathaway Brightman House is a historic house located at 205 Crescent Street in Fall River, Massachusetts, in the Border City neighborhood.


== Description and history ==
It is a 1-1/2 story, wood-framed structure, four bays wide, with a side gable roof that has a front-facing gable with bracketed eave. The house was built in about 1858 and added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1983.
